name: KuduCommandLine
description: Execute a shell command using the Command endpoint in the Kudu rest api
author: Arjan van Rijn
helpMarkDown: Kudu is the deployment engine behind the Azure Appservice. This task can be used to execute arbitrary shell commands using the Command endpoint in the Kudu rest api. This is useful for running Package manager restore commands after deployment. [Deployment-credentials](https://github.com/projectkudu/kudu/wiki/Deployment-credentials), [Kudu-rest-api](https://github.com/projectkudu/kudu/wiki/REST-API#command)

inputs.name: appserviceName
inputs.label: AppService name
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the first part of your .azurewebsite.net url

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Site-level credentials username (aka Publish Profile Credentials), Consists of '$' + Appservice name

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Site-level credentials password (aka Publish Profile Credentials)

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The command to run in the [command  rest api](https://github.com/projectkudu/kudu/wiki/REST-API#command)

inputs.name: dir
inputs.label: Dir
inputs.helpMarkDown: The working directory for the command
